subject: RE: [junit] Re: 4.5 release candidate
msgSnippet: Johannes, That will be fine. We will release when the software is ready. Cheers, Kent Beck Three Rivers Institute _____ From: junit@yahoogroups.com
messageBody:
Johannes,

That will be fine. We will release when the software is ready.

Cheers,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute

_____

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Johannes Link
Sent: Thursday, June 26, 2008 10:51 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Re: 4.5 release candidate



I knew I wouldn't be able to trick you into doing my work ;-)

Thanks for the offer; I'll have a shot at it and get back to you on
Monday. Would that be early enough?

Johannes

--- In junit@yahoogroups. <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com> com, "Kent Beck"
<kentb@...> wrote:
>
> Johannes,
>
> I apologize for not getting back to you sooner about this. I'll make
you a
> deal. I'll put the method back in if you supply the unit test for it. (I
> looked at it and couldn't think of how to test it.)
>
> CVS head contains a version that includes the missing Suite
constructor. Let
> me know if it works for you.
>
> Cheers,
>
> Kent Beck
> Three Rivers Institute
